Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-24786 affecting package sriov-network-device-plugin for versions less than 3.6.2-6
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-24786 affecting package sriov-network-device-plugin for versions less than 3.6.2-6. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package sriov-network-device-plugin is earlier than 3.6.2-6, affected by CVE-2024-24786
